Documentation.firstline: Creates a file of pivot/target pairs with a Gini impurity value
Documentation.content: Creates a file of pivot/target pairs with a Gini impurity value.

param.name: infile
param.desc: the input file, any type with a work item field

param.name: pivot
param.desc: the name of the pivot field

param.name: target
param.desc: the name of the field used as the target

param.name: wi_name
param.desc: the name of the work item field, default is "wi" return A table by Work Item and Pivot value giving count and Gini impurity value
